Centalun bụ nke Boehringer Ingelheim mepụtara na 1962 ma bụrụ ọgwụ psycholeptic nwere mmetụta hypnotic na sedative, site na allosteric agonism nke onye na-anabata GABAA. A na-eji ya eme ihe n'oge gara aga maka sedation na usoro nke ụwa na ụdị àlà ahụike dịka ịwa ahụ, orthopedics na gynecology na ụdị nke ụwa na ụdị, ọ bụ ezie na ọ naghịzi eji ya eme ihe na ahụike. N'agbanyeghị akụkọ ihe mere eme nke iji ya eme ihe n'ụlọ ọgwụ, etinyeghị centalun n'ime CSA ma ya mere ọ ka na-enweghị nchịkwa dị ka ọgwụ mmegbu
